review: I think this is a very good product and would reccomd it to everyone!
author: Angela lawson

review: Love it. Wish we would have purchased it sooner. Bye, bye overpriced cable!
author: Connie Oliveaux

review: Easy to set up. Voice command is a nice touch. Navigation is still a bit awkward but not as bad as many smart tv's. Nice selection of services available. Be careful...you will end up paying for a couple of shows that you thought were free till you get the hang of it. I use it a lot. Well worth the money. Very small footprint. Simple remote.
author: Frank A. Bowdon

review: I LOVE the amazon fire. I was on the fence about buying it but I'm so glad I did! I have amazon prime and also just signed up for Netflix. This works great. Next step cancel cable.... this has everything I need now.
author: mom of3

review: Easy to install. Voice search works surprisingly well but limited to only Amazon choices.
author: Anon

review: It turn my TV into a smart TV
author: Al Long

review: So easy to install and find shows I love and "Transparent" is amazing.
author: carol m. kornfeld

review: Nice, works pissa with my Plex server.
author: Keith Clark
